data.fullContent: In the black comedy Tully (2018), directed by Jason Reitman and written by Diablo Cody, Theron played an overwhelmed mother of three. The film was acclaimed by critics, who concluded that it `` delves into the modern parenthood experience with an admirably deft blend of humor and raw honesty, brought to life by an outstanding performance by Charlize Theron ''. She also played the president of a pharmaceutical in the little-seen crime film Gringo and produced the biographical war drama film A Private War, both released in 2018.
data.answer: 在由杰森·瑞特曼执导、迪亚波罗·科迪编剧的黑色喜剧《塔利》(Tully, 2018)中，塞隆扮演了一位不知所措的三个孩子的母亲。影评人对这部电影好评如潮，认为它“以令人钦佩的娴熟技巧，将幽默与原始的诚实融合在一起，深入探索了现代父母的经历，查理兹·塞隆的出色表演赋予了这部电影生命。”她还在少见的犯罪电影《外国佬》(Gringo)中饰演一家制药公司的总统，并制作了传记性战争片《私人战争》(a Private war)，这两部电影都于2018年上映。
